title: Plan for Capital Gains Tax
description: An individual is planning to sell a large amount of stock and wants to understand the tax implications.

tasks.description: Determine the cost basis and holding period for the stock being sold.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the basis and determines the gain will be long-term.

tasks.description: Calculate the estimated capital gain from the sale.
Estimate the total capital gains tax due and advise the client on setting aside funds for the tax payment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a clear estimate of the tax liability and advises the client accordingly.
